name: c2c lemon peel dishcloth
notes:
> **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code!
> [subscribe here][2]**

join my [fb group][1] to share your makes, get exclusive discounts, cal’s, and free patterns.

> this pattern is part of my [6 different c2c crochet stitches: vol. 2](/patterns/sources/6-different-c2c-crochet-stitches-vol-2)
> ebook. save and get the ebook!

the c2c crochet lemon peel stitch has a lovely texture, it's perfect for blankets, and dishcloths, and a great stitch for beginners.
i took this stitch and made it into a corner to corner method. crochet c2c is my favorite way of working blankets and washcloths, it gives you the flexibility to decide the finished measurements of your work as you go.


**you can find the video tutorial for the square version here:** https://youtu.be/j7rimbtizua

**this pdf pattern can be worked both as a square and as a rectangle.**

this c2c stitch is great for a washcloth/dishcloth or a very soft c2c blanket. it’s repetitive and so easy, totally mindless crocheting.
you can work this stitch with any yarn weight and a suitable hook.

- skill level - easy.
- the pattern is written using english (u.s) terminology.
- the pattern is made with dk (#3) yarn and a 4.0 / g mm hook (although you can use any yarn with a suitable hook).
- finished size- 6.5×6.5'' (16.5x16.5 cm).
- amount yarn needed: 25gr/53m/58yds.

the pattern is available for free on my blog.

return/refund policy: due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file, all sales are final.
